channel.title: Kotick insults every game developer on the planet
channel.description:
Activision, insulting my only true game developer?
[url='https://www.computerandvideogames.com/article.php?id=265559']More likely than you think.[/url] [quote] "Bungie are a very unusual company, They're probably the last remaining high quality independent developer. It's very hard to ...(bullshit goes here). And they're a [i]real[/i] company. [/quote]
[quote] Meanwhile, Kotick has expressed a wish to sell repackaged in-game cutscenes to gamers as $30 movies. [/quote] :what:

item.title: Kotick insults every game developer on the planet
item.dc:creator: DethklokSoldier
item.description:
Wow. I’ve never ever heard of this guy before and I want him to shut his damn mouth. What a dumb ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Kotick insults every game developer on the planet
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Keep in mind their publishers were demanding it.
Bungie is/was a good developer, they were just forced to make shitty Halo sequels instead of good games, or even decent Halo sequels (Which would take too long to make as far as the publishers were concerned)
